articles.description: Follow live text, Test Match Special commentary and in-play clips from day four of the fifth Ashes Test between England and Australia at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Ashes build-up: Reaction to Broad retirement as England seek victory

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from the Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix build-up - Leclerc starts on pole

articles.description: Manuela Vanegas scores a 97th-minute winner as Colombia stun Germany 2-1 at the 2023 Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Injury time winner sees Colombia stun Germany

articles.description: Watch as Colombia's 18-year-old Linda Caicedo opens the scoring against Germany with a brilliant individual goal at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Caicedo's 'incredible finish' puts Colombia ahead

articles.description: Stuart Broad hits his last ball in Test cricket for a six on day four of the fifth Ashes Test at The Oval.
articles.title: Broad hits his last ball in Test cricket for six

articles.description: Drivers say the poor quality of Formula 1's 'extreme' wet tyre is adding complications when starting races in bad visibility.
articles.title: Drivers critical of 'pointless' extreme wet tyres

articles.description: Co-hosts New Zealand are knocked out of the Fifa Women's World Cup as Switzerland get the draw they need to advance as Group A winners.
articles.title: Co-hosts New Zealand out of Women's World Cup

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag challenges his side to "raise the bar" and find "consistency" to achieve the targets he has set them.
articles.title: Ten Hag on Hojlund, Onana, style of play & Man Utd sale

articles.description: The inaugural Bellator flyweight title fight between Kyoji Horiguchi and Makoto Takahashi ends a no contest while Patricky Freire stops Roberto de Souza in Japan.
articles.title: Eye poke ends Bellator title fight after 25 seconds

articles.description: Watch BBC Two coverage live from Sunderland of the World Triathlon Series mixed relay
articles.title: Watch: World Triathlon Series: Sunderland - Mixed Relay
